title: Finding Nemo
short_plot_summary: A clownfish named Marlin goes on an epic journey to find his son, Nemo, who was captured and placed in a fish tank in a dentist's office.
explanation: A clownfish, representing Nemo, the main character of the story
A magnifying glass, symbolizing the search for Nemo by his father, Marlin
A turtle, representing Crush, the helpful sea turtle who assists Marlin on his journey
A shark, illustrating the dangerous encounters faced by Marlin and Dory, like meeting a great white shark named Bruce
A fish, signifying the various underwater sea creatures that Marlin and Dory encounter during their adventure
